sense.def:
A street
je cesta v mestu ali vasi, ob kateri so navadno hiše.

seg.quote: The two men walked slowly down the street.

sense.def:
Izraz
street
lahko uporabimo pri pogovoru o dejavnostih v mestu in na prostem.

seg.quote: We've got to keep youngsters off the streets.
We don't usually embrace friends in the street.

sense.def:
The man in the street
je izraz, s katerim označujemo navadne ljudi na splošno.

seg.quote: The man in the street was unlikely ever to have seen a ghost.
